sentence.Network_en: He said softly, as if his voice were coming from a sepulcher.
sentence.Network_cn: 他幽幽说道, 象是从坟墓里传来的声音.

sentence.Network_en: Let us bend before the venerated sepulcher.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我们在他神圣的墓前鞠躬致敬.
把它环绕在那爱的墓地.
